headline: Vinson & Elkins Advises Bapco Energies in Joint Venture with EOG Resources, Inc.
summary: By Karen Roman Vinson & Elkins said it advised Bapco Energies in the Kingdom of Bahrain in closing a landmark strategic concession agreement and related joint venture with EOG Resources Bahrain Awali WLL. The latter is a wholly owned subsidiary of EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE: EOG), a United States independent oil and gas exploration and […] The post Vinson & Elkins Advises Bapco Energies in Joint Venture with EOG Resources, Inc. appeared first on CorpGov.
